perturbation.original_text: A. "Contract Period" shall mean that period of time of three (3) years commencing on November 1st, 2017 and concluding November 2nd, 2020, unless terminated sooner or extended as provided in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: A. "Contract Period" shall mean that period of time of three (3) years commencing on November 1st, 2017 and concluding November 2nd, 2020, and will not be extended under any circumstance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows for potential extension of the contract period, while the modified text explicitly prohibits any extension. This creates a contradiction by eliminating the flexibility that was initially provided for, which is not allowed under general contract law that allows modifications by mutual agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Principles of Amendment and Modification

perturbation.original_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period at the Company's sole discretion, regardless of any conflicting stipulations in this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause specifies that products can only be added via written amendment. The modified text contradicts this by stating the Company can add products at its sole discretion, overriding the amendment clause. This contradicts the mutual consent requirement for contract modifications.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Principles of Amendment and Modification

perturbation.original_text: All such arbitration shall take place at the office of the American Arbitration Association located within 225 miles of Hayward, California.
perturbation.changed_text: All such arbitration shall take place in a location determined solely by the Company, irrespective of the American Arbitration Association's location or rules.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a location for arbitration within a specific range. The modified text allows the Company to choose any location, conflicting with the initial agreement on arbitration venue. This undermines the agreement to arbitrate under specific, pre-agreed terms.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Arbitration Act - Enforceability of Arbitration Agreements; Contract Law - Agreement on Key Terms
